Short dress in denim made from a cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back. Sewn-in wrapover at the front with ties at the waist.
Hat in braided paper straw with embroidery on the brim. Width of brim 10 cm.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Straight-cut, oversized top in airy slub jersey made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front and high waist with ties at one side.
Short, sleeveless top in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the front, smocking at the back and a scalloped hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a V-shaped opening and concealed buttons at the front. Gathered yoke, long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs, a seam at the hips and wide, gathered skirt with an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in stretch cotton twill with contrasting colour seams, a high waist, zip fly and button and large patch pockets. The cotton content of the skirt is partly organic.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders, side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders, side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders, side pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave made from an organic cotton blend with inset hole embroidery. Deep, frill-trimmed V-neck, long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short dungaree dress in cotton with a zip down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, and patch front pockets.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and open chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and open chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles.

Shoes in a cotton weave with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Shoes in a cotton weave with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Imitation leather sandals with a padded mesh edge, hook and loop fastener at the top and loop at the back. Cotton lining. Grippy soles.
Skirt in crinkled, patterned jersey with a decorative knot detail at the top and a high slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated hem.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated hem.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with frills at the top, an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with frills at the top, an opening and button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist.
A-line dress in soft, jacquard-knit jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, fake welt front pockets, a ribbed neckline, and press-studs on one shoulder.
A-line dress in soft, jacquard-knit jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, fake welt front pockets, a ribbed neckline, and press-studs on one shoulder.
Calf-length skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, buttons down the front and fake flap front pockets. Lined.
Shorts in stretch twill with shimmering side stripes, a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Shorts in stretch twill with shimmering side stripes, a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Fitted jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a long sleeves, a polo neck with a roll edge at the top, and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.

Jumpsuit in crinkled satin with a sheen. Deep V-neck, buttons at the top, smocking at the shoulders and short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill at the hems. Elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide, lined legs. The polyester content of the jumpsuit is partly recycled.
Slip-on trainers in grained imitation leather. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slip-on trainers in grained imitation leather. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend containing some cashmere. Size 45x250 cm.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a ribbed neckline, short sleeves and a sewn-on bow at the front.

Two pairs of 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
